title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 137.0 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 137.0 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to the
responsibility imposed by section
135
of the

Civil Service Law and subdivision 7 of section
44
of the

State Finance Law, the Director of the Budget has determined the fair values of
food, lodging and other types of maintenance provided by the State to its
employees. (b) These values have
been arrived at after study of the types and qualities of maintenance now being
furnished by the State, the costs to the State of providing such maintenance, the charges made for comparable services in adjoining communities, and the
maintenance plans and values in effect in facilities of the Federal government
and other states and in municipal and private hospitals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
137.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
